actionTemplate.title: Blush for Babyface (Round/Cute Features)
steps: Start at the highest point of the apple of the cheek
Place slightly lower and sweep horizontally for a short distance
Build in thin layers and diffuse the edges outward
Lightly set the perimeter so it melts into the base

rationaleTemplate: Keeps the center of the face from looking even rounder.
A horizontal sweep adds balance and proportion.
